Helped colleges strengthen their projects by mentoring them on their social and economic models. Successfully helped 3 colleges expand to multiple states in India and reach the World Cup.

positions.subtitle: Enactus
positions.description: Led a 70 member team and super headed three community outreach projects in the ﬁelds of waste management, water, sanitation and education. Managed end to end operations of diverse projects- need analysis, community engagement, process ﬂows and business management. Headed Project Dhara to the top 4 of the World Water Race 2018 and Indian National Summit 2019 (selected out of 78 colleges). Implemented waste management models in over 5 states in India generating over 3.5 lakhs in revenue. Increased awareness through digital media strategies, recycling models and brand development.Led Project Iffat to the top 12 of the World Water Race 2018. Engaged an economically and socially vulnerable HIV community and helped them earn a living by upcycling soaps. Partnerships with ﬁve star hotels for procurement and sales through government retailers made the project attractive to MNCs and investors in the World Water Race 2018.Successfully procured sponsorship worth 77000 Rs from MNCs like Reliance and also won the KPMG Business Ethics Grant.
positions.title: President
positions.description_html:
Led a 70 member team and super headed three community outreach projects in the ﬁelds of waste management, water, sanitation and education. Managed end to end operations of diverse projects- need analysis, community engagement, process ﬂows and business management.

Headed Project Dhara to the top 4 of the World Water Race 2018 and Indian National Summit 2019 (selected out of 78 colleges). Implemented waste management models in over 5 states in India generating over 3.5 lakhs in revenue. Increased awareness through digital media strategies, recycling models and brand development.

Led Project Iffat to the top 12 of the World Water Race 2018. Engaged an economically and socially vulnerable HIV community and helped them earn a living by upcycling soaps. Partnerships with ﬁve star hotels for procurement and sales through government retailers made the project attractive to MNCs and investors in the World Water Race 2018.

Successfully procured sponsorship worth 77000 Rs from MNCs like Reliance and also won the KPMG Business Ethics Grant.
